title: God-King Garen Voiceline Bugs
body:
Sup Rito

Theres a small Bug with God-King Garens voicelines.

If you hit a Q and you immediately stop all actions with the S-Hotkey, you trigger two different voicelines at the same time.
Im not sure if you need to kill a minion to do it or not, did not really want to test it on champs in ranked games and if you hit a minion with Q it tends to die.

This might also apply to God-King Darius W as the same "rules" apply not sure though, might test it if i manage to get some games in today.

replies.body: In case you only understand english: Happens on God King Darius too. (It happens only when you activate your W)
Warum schreibst du englisch im deutschen Forum?
